prefuse.controls

Class MouseCoordinatesControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • prefuse.controls.ControlAdapter
      • prefuse.controls.MouseCoordinatesControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener, Control

    public class MouseCoordinatesControl
extends ControlAdapter
    A control that saves the relative mouse position to an item when the mouse moves over an item. The relative mouse position is the position of the mouse seen as the distance from the item's upper left corner.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      MouseCoordinatesControl() 
      MouseCoordinatesControl(String activity)
      Creates a new control that runs the given activity whenever the mouse moves over an item line number changes.
